attributes.name: icon
attributes.desc: set representation type to Icon, more info on Icon Component

attributes.name: src
attributes.desc: the address of the image for an image avatar

attributes.name: srcSet
attributes.desc: A list of one or more strings separated by commas indicating a set of possible image sources for the user agent to use

attributes.name: alt
attributes.desc: This attribute defines an alternative text description of the image

attributes.name: fit
attributes.desc: set how the image fit its container for an image avatar

events.name: @error
events.desc: handler when img load error, return false to prevent default fallback behavior
